title: Deals: M1 Pro MacBook Pro $250 off, World Backup Day discounts, more
content:
Alongside all of the World Backup Day discounts that are now live today, all of the best Apple deals kick off with the latest 14-inch M1 Pro MacBook Pro. That’s alongside a chance to save on previous-generation iPad Pros from $400. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

description: World Backup Day discounts have gone live with hard drives, SSDs, and much more alongside $250 off M1 Pro MacBook Pro.
